page.title: 06FARMING
page.content: The area is not self-sufficient and is forced to rely on trade, its main export products being tomatoes and flowers.Horticulture is the main activity and agriculture basically supports livestock farming.Apart from a few sheep,the only livestock in the area are cows,the Guernsey being predominant and used in dairy-farming but there are also a few Charolais which have been introduced to improve the strain of the native type since there is a danger of inbreeding. There is very little meat cattle and again the area is forced to rely on imports. {DAIRY-FARMING}Almost all the cattle in the area is reared for this purpose and the area is self-sufficient in dairy products.
